original_text: For it was not to angels that God subjected the world to come, of which we are speaking.
korean_text: 하나님이 우리가 말하는 바 장차 올 세상을 천사들에게 복종하게 하심이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: For it was not to angels
that God subjected the world to come
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 장차 올 세상을 복종시키신 것
